item.description:
The European Medical Device Market - Re-Examined

When: June 13, 2012 | 8:00 am - 10:30 am
Where: Mass. Medical Society, 860 Winter St, Waltham, MA 02451

Learn more and register on http://www.massmedic.com/events/the-european-medical-device-market-re-examined/.

Â 

Delays in product clearance and approval at FDA have led many companies to launch new medical products in Europe. This trend has led many companies to re-examine this particular market as a site for a number of operational functions, including R&D and manufacturing. This seminar will provide attendees with the latest information on obtaining the CE Mark , manufacturing, logistics, research opportunities and reimbursement in the Euro Zone.
item.name: The European Medical Device Market - Re-Examined
